name: v2.4.0
body:
## What's Changed
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/312
* drop django 2.2 by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/317
* save extended properties only when asked for by @AmitPhulera in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/316
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/320
* Fix atomic transaction not routing to the the correct DB by @nofalx in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/324

## New Contributors
* @AmitPhulera made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/316
* @nofalx made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/324

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/compare/v2.3.1...v2.4.0

name: v2.3.1
body:
## What's Changed
* Remove hard dependency on psycopg2 by @intgr in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/292
* Fix #296 Stop producing a universal wheel, python 2 is unspported by @gopackgo90 in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/297
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/298
* Update group related Simplified Chinese translations. by @ifmos in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/300
* fix: The description content type set to RST by @marksweb in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/301
* update tox by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/303
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/304

## New Contributors
* @marksweb made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/301

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/compare/v2.3.0...v2.3.1

name: v2.3.0
body:
## What's Changed
* Fix default_app_config deprecation by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/221
* enable pre-commit by @graingert in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/223
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/225
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/226
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/228
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/231
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/234
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/236
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/240
* Use string values for django-cache keys #230 by @badeendjuh in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/242
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/243
* feat: raw delete expired instead of `Queryset.delete` by @daadu in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/235
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/244
* Fix issue `pydoc.ErrorDuringImport: problem in django_celery_results.… by @pmaigutyak in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/247
* drop flake8plus by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/246
* try update makefile by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/245
* Test on Python 3.10 by @D3X in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/249
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/251
* Russian language support by @ildarworld in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/255
* Russian translation updates by @f213 in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/256
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/260
* update setuppy by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/258
* drop python 3.6 fron CI by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/254
* codeql by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/262
* celery 5.2 by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/250
* Add Simplified Chinese translation strings and fix comment typo. by @ifmos in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/263
* Fix locale in dir tree. by @ifmos in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/265
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/267
* tidelift alignment action by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/269
* relaxed django v4 by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/270
* bum min pytest versions by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/271
* feat: add periodic_task_name by @lvelvee in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/261
* update CI with django 4.0 by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/272
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/276
* [pre-commit.ci] pre-commit autoupdate by @pre-commit-ci in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/277
* Add translation of the messages to brazilian portuguese by @EduardoJM in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/278
* Fix properties default value by @KOliver94 in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/281
* Work around Oracle migration instability by @intgr in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/283
* Fix field size for MySQL (#285) by @benselme in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/287
* Add retry logic for Django and Psycopg2 InterfaceErrors by @juspence in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/290
* update python & pypy min version by @auvipy in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/291

## New Contributors
* @graingert made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/223
* @pre-commit-ci made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/225
* @badeendjuh made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/242
* @daadu made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/235
* @pmaigutyak made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/247
* @ildarworld made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/255
* @f213 made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/256
* @ifmos made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/263
* @lvelvee made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/261
* @EduardoJM made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/278
* @KOliver94 made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/281
* @intgr made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/283
* @benselme made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/287
* @juspence made their first contribution in https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/pull/290

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/celery/django-celery-results/compare/v2.2.0...v2.3.0

name: v2.2.0
body:
2.2.0
=====
:release-date: 2021-07-02 11:00 a.m. UTC+6:00
:release-by: Asif Saif Uddin

- add new urls with nouns first structure (#216) 
- Remove duplicate indexes 
- fix group status view return data, add tests for it (#215)
- typo fix (#218)
- Use the DJANGO_CELERY_RESULTS_TASK_ID_MAX_LENGTH for group_id/task_id
- Minor code clean up

name: v2.0.1
body:
2.0.1
=====
:release-date: 2021-01-19 07:30 p.m. UTC+6:00
:release-by: Asif Saif Uddin

- Fix backward compatibility in DatabaseBackend._store_result function
- Fix 'args' and 'kwargs' propiertes of AsyncResult for DatabaseBackend
- Fix task_args/task_kwargs in task_protocol=1
- Test refactors
- Add task_args and task_kwargs to admins searchable fields (#182)

1.0.3 is a broken release.
Please 1.0.4 instead.
